mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw,me_name, me_address, me_phone) values(#{member.me_id},#{member.me_pw},#{member.me_name},#{member.me_address},#{member.me_phone})
mapper.update: update member set me_name = #{member.me_name}, me_address = #{member.me_address}, me_phone = #{member.me_phone} where me_id = #{member.me_id}
